returns._0: bool True if the account can create seasons

completeSeasonManually(uint256).details: Only for emergency use when automatic completion fails

finalizeSeason(uint256).details: Can be called by anyone when season is in Distributing status with VRF words

returns._0: uint256 The current active season ID or 0 if no active season

returns.endRange: The end of the player's number range
returns.startRange: The start of the player's number range

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

returns._0: address The winner address or address(0) if not determined yet

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

returns._0: bool True if the season is active

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

requestSeasonEndEarly(uint256).details: Locks trading, marks EndRequested -> VRFPending, and triggers VRF like normal end.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params._hatsProtocol: The Hats.sol contract address (or address(0) to disable)

params._hatId: The hat ID that grants sponsor rights (or 0 to disable)

setupPrizeDistributionManually(uint256).details: Only for emergency use when automatic prize distribution setup fails

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

_executeFinalizationExternal(uint256).notice: External wrapper to enable try/catch pattern for auto-finalization

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

canCreateSeason(address).notice: Check if an address can create seasons (has Sponsor hat OR SEASON_CREATOR_ROLE)

completeSeasonManually(uint256).notice: Manually complete a season that is stuck in Distributing state

createSeason((string,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Create a new season: deploy RaffleToken and SOFBondingCurve, grant roles, init curve.

finalizeSeason(uint256).notice: Manual fallback to finalize a season if auto-finalization failed

getCurrentSeason().notice: Get the current active season ID

getFinalPlayerPosition(uint256,address).notice: Get the final player position after season completion

getNumberRange(uint256,address).notice: Get the number range for a player in a season

getPlayerList(uint256).notice: Get the player list for a season

getTotalTickets(uint256).notice: Get the total tickets for a season

isSeasonActive(uint256).notice: Check if a season is active

requestSeasonEndEarly(uint256).notice: Emergency-only early end. Skips endTime check but requires Active status.

setCoordinator(address).notice: Sets the VRF Coordinator addressThis method should only be callable by the coordinator or contract owner

setDefaultGrandPrizeBps(uint16).notice: Update the default grand prize split (in basis points)

setGatingContract(address).notice: Set the gating contract for participation requirements

setHatsProtocol(address).notice: Set the Hats Protocol contract address

setPrizeDistributor(address).notice: Set the raffle prize distributor contract

setSponsorHat(uint256).notice: Set the Sponsor Hat ID for permissionless season creation

setupPrizeDistributionManually(uint256).notice: Manually trigger prize distribution setup for a season that is stuck in Distributing state

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address.
